procedure_1.csv.text: This is the start of a new experiment.

zqa_pq.csv: A number of statements are shown below that describe some ways in which people act and think. Please indicate for each statement how much you agree or disagree. If you have not experienced that circumstance, please try to describe how you would act or what you think about that situation. Be sure to indicate your agreement or disagreement for every statement.
I enjoy the sensations of speeding in a car
I would like to take off on a trip with no pre-planned or definite routes or timetables
I prefer friends who are excitingly unpredictable
I like some physical activities that are somewhat risky
I enjoy getting into new situations where you can’t predict how things will turn out
I get restless if I have to stay around home for any length of time
I prefer fast-moving activities or sports
I would like the kind of life where one is on the move and traveling a lot, with lots of change and excitement
I like to let myself go and do impulsive things just for fun
I enjoy spending time in the familiar surroundings of my home or apartment
I would like to learn to fly an airplane
I would like to travel to foreign lands where the people are quite different from the people in my own country
I go to parties to meet exciting and stimulating people
I am polite and attentive to someone even if I do not find their conversation interesting
I think I would enjoy being a fire-fighter
I like people who are unusual or different from most other people
I do not try to restrain my urges to have exciting experiences
I have a reserved and cautious attitude toward life
If I were in the Army I might volunteer for exciting but dangerous duties
I enjoy many types of loud, intense rock music
I prefer quiet parties where one can have good conversation
My thinking is usually cautious and sensible
I do not like to engage in sports or activities in which there is a significant risk of getting hurt
I would not like a job involving a lot of travel
I am not interested in having new experiences just for the sake of experiencing new sensations
I don’t like to start a project until I know exactly how to proceed
I don’t think I would like flying in a small airplane
I do not like people who behave in uncontrolled and unconventional ways
I enjoy quiet, melodic popular or classical music
I tend to value and follow a rational and moderate approach to things
Given a choice I would never volunteer for any activity that is physically risky
I am comfortable with the familiarity of a fixed daily routine
One should not go too far in physical intimacy until one gets to know the other person
I usually make up my mind through careful reasoning
I would never travel to other countries where there is unrest and the threat of violence
I would prefer to travel to places where people speak my language and have the same customs
One of my goals in life is to experience intense and pleasurable sensations
Before I get into a new situation I like to find out what to expect from it
ius.csv: You will find a series of statements that describe how people may react to the uncertainties of life.  Please use the scale to describe to what extent each item is characteristic of you.
Uncertainty stops me from having a firm opinion
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
Being uncertain means that a person is disorganized
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
It's not fair that there are no guarantees in life
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
My mind can't be relaxed if I don’t know what will happen tomorrow
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
Uncertainty makes me uneasy, anxious, or stressed
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
It frustrates me not having all the information I need
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
Being uncertain allows me to forsee the consequences beforehand and to prepare for them
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
One should always look ahead so as to avoid surprises
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
A small unforseen event can spoil everything, even with the best of planning
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
When it's time to act uncertainty paralyzes me
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
Being uncertain means that I am not first rate
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
When I am uncertain I can't go forward
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
When I am uncertain I can't function very well
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
Unlike me, others always seem to know where they are going with their lives
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
Uncertainty makes me vulnerable, unhappy, or sad
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
I always want to know what the future has in store for me
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
I hate being taken by surprise
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
The smallest doubt stops mefrom acting
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
I should be able to organize everything in advance
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
Being uncertain means that I lack confidence
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
I think it's unfair that other people seem sure about their future
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
Uncertainty stops me from sleeping well
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
I must get away from uncertain situations
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
The ambiguities in life stress me
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
I can't stand being undecided about my future
Not at all characteristic of me||||Highly characteristic of me
bis11.csv: People differ in the ways they act and think in different situations.  This is a test to measure some of the ways in which you act and think.  Read each statement and select the most appropriate answer. Do not spend too much time on any statement. Answer quickly and honestly
I plan trips well ahead of time
I like to think about complex problems
I get easily bored when solving thought problems
I act on the spur of the moment
I can only think about one thing at a time
I spend or charge more than I earn
I often have extraneous thoughts when thinking
I am more interested in the present than the future
I am restless at the theater or lectures
